Uses of Class
atomica.objects.GameSettings

Packages that use GameSettings
atomica.logic Provides model classes with application logic. 
atomica.objects Provides all object classes of the model. 
atomica.ui Provides all classes for the user interface (view). 
 

Uses of GameSettings in atomica.logic

          Creates an Editor instance with a GameSituation defined by the given DefaultGameSettings.

          Creates a new Game with random initial Tokens using the given game settings.

Subclasses of GameSettings in atomica.objects

          Represents the default settings defining a game.

Fields in atomica.objects declared as GameSettings
